name: Quest Giver (itch)
description:
This is my game for the 1GAM december 2015.

I publish this game as is, in the state I leaved it January the 1st.

I spent around 7 evenings making it, so it's far from being a finished game.

X is for Action/Validate

C is for Back/Cancel

In a RPG you play as an NPC, and you give quests to some random adventurers. You can ask them you bring you back many items, they can fail, or succeed.
